title: 2860 Greenwich Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788126); Extensive decay, branch failures, and fruiting bodies present, these trees were topped many years ago allowing decay to enter into branches and creating poor structure; tree one (1) cannot be replaced due to proximity to gas line, tree two (2) will be replaced

title: 129 Lunado Way
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788168); Cypress on Junipero Serra side of 129 Lunado, has poor structure and roots will be destabilized when repairs to retaining wall and garage door occur, pavement in backyard also requires repair and root pruning is unavoidable as assessed by BUF Staff, past failures caused by decay in poor unions, owner has hired arborists to attempt to mitigate structure but structure is too poor to remedy and cuts are too large to compartmentalize; can be replaced on Lunado frontage which is a 16 ft right-of-way

title: 140 Divisadero Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788220); canopy decline greater than 80 percent, thrips infestation; property owner will replace

title: 4512 23rd Street
Reason(s) for removal: Propety owner applied for removal permit (788156); to be removed for construction of new building and driveway, tree is in poor condition, is out-shaded by neighboring trees and has poor structure; property owner will replace

title: 158 Dolores Street
Reason(s) for removal: 80% of canopy is dead; will be replaced

title: 313 - 333 Burnett Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788205); six significant trees on private property approved for removal for construction of new building and excavation for new foundation; three to six new trees will be planted in new sidewalk depending on utility alignment; see PDF for more information

title: 3944 22nd Street
Reason(s) for removal: Tree is located inpublic right-of-way, Public Works and adjacent property owner are working together to build new retaining wall, root system will likely be significantly impacted; will be replaced after construction

title: 99X Woodward Street (334 14th Street)
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788125); all seven significant trees are within the footprint of planned new building construction; 10-15 new street trees and landscaping will be planted along all three sidewalk frontages; see PDF for additional information

title: 151 Potrero Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788172); will suffer significant root and canopy impacts from new construction; project will plant new 1-2 new trees on Potrero Avenue and 8-10 new trees on other frontages

title: 151 Potrero Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788172); has hazardous scaffold branch structure; project will plant new 1-2 new trees on Potrero Avenue and 8-10 new trees on other frontages

title: 870 Kansas Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788049); has several dead limbs and for construction of new curb cutout, driveway and garage; cannot be replaced due to inadequate spacing and underground utility conflicts, property owner will pay loss of planting location fee

title: 1407 Shafter Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: In poor condition, has experienced multiple limb failures, most recent was large limb failure over resident's driveway; will be replaced pending underground utilities check
